title: Drawing, "Design for a tile"
markings:
Upper Left Margin: (stamp) 17/George Street/Morris/Hanover Square/London. Lower left margin: 5"x5" 2/3 each 
On Verso: Right Margin, Cooper Union Stamp
description: A stylized flower head, with its elements (stamen and petals) separated, decorates the center of the tile. Stems and leaves of a more realistic nature cover the rest of the surface.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for a tile".
graphite on tracing paper. Gift of Robert W. Friedel. 1941-74-17.
